resources.string: The McGill Hong Kong Student Network is a student-run organization officially founded in 2006. With over 400 members this year, the vision of the network is to connect students within the McGill student body to Hong Kong by building bridges that facilitate the integration of our members within the Hong Kong community for all purposes including travel and work.

\t\tThe Hong Kong Student Network strives to welcome new students from all over the world and showcase to them the wonderfulness that is McGill. We pride ourselves on being a home away from home, and we embrace the multiculturalism that Hong Kong is known for. \n\t\tOver the course of the semester, HKSN organizes a wide variety of events, from singing competitions to ski trips to showcase this sentiment. We hope that everyone who joins HKSN will have an awesome time and meet lots of new people! \n\t\tOur membership cards provide deals from over 25+ sponsors that are displayed in this app, purchase one today for only 5$!.

Email: mcgillhksn@gmail.com 
Website: hksn.ca 
Office Hours: 
SSMU Building Suite 408 
Tues - Thur 2-6PM

Alto Restaurant has proudly served the residents of Montréal for over 29 years. Alto\'s offers a diverse selection of Italian and Canadian classics, including pizza, pasta, poutine, grilled meat, and more.
C\'ChoColat is a contemporary chocolatier in the heart of downtown Montreal. It serves gourmet chocolates, sweets, and is a perfect place to take that special someone.

Cacao 70 is a unique place for relaxing and sharing. it\’s a perfect place to drop by after a hectic day at school or work to enjoy some of the best chocolate in Montreal. They also serve a fantastic brunch menu worth getting out of bed for. don’t forget to bring a friend with you. chocolate is an ingredient that brings people together!
Cozy basement-level Persian tea & coffee spot offering sweets, art on the walls & live music.
The Starbucks of boba, Chatime serves the best bubble tea in the world! Come enjoy a free upgrade with HKSN!
Sells Chinese barbeque as well as other traditional dishes! Located in the heart of Chinatown, enjoy a hearty traditional meal with a discount on HKSN!

Stop by Edo Japan\'s Montreal location in Montreal Eaton Centre and satisfy your hunger with a sizzling hot Teppanyaki meal made with choice meats and fresh vegetables topped with their famous Teriyaki sauce, or choose from a selection of handmade sushi. It\'s fast, fresh and delicious food made simply better.
An ever-changing menu of gourmet sandwiches, fresh soups, salads and ready-made meals to go. Try Fou D\'Ici today with 10% off on HKSN!
Health-minded, counter-serve chain offering tossed-to-order salads plus soups, burritos & more. Leave that Candy bar in the trash and enjoy 5% off on HKSN!
Delicious crepes, pasteries, and homebrewed coffee located right above Parc Metro. Try this lovely Japanese-style cafe today and enjoy 10% off on HKSN!
Delicious Korean cuisine in the heart of downtown Montreal. Authentic Kimchi, Kimbap, and other amazing dishes. Enjoy 15% off on HKSN!
Amazing online art retailer with Monreal roots. Want some amazing wall decor? Hit up Inspirer.ca with HKSN and get 20% off!
Trendy Cafe located near Concordia serving paninis, chacuterie, and craft cocktails. Occasionally hosts poetry and art events and is perfect to take a date or friend!
Located in the heart of Chinatown, L2 Lounge serves some of the best bubble tea in Montreal! Also sells delicious meals to pair up with that yummy boba!

An upscale Chinese restaurant in the heart of Chinatown, Downtown! Cristal Chinois presents a variety of well known dishes such as Peking Duck, and a large variety of live seafood such as lobsters, crabs and fishes! They also serve Dim Sum, yum!

Delicious Korean bakery on Bishop street that serves up all kinds of wonderful sweets! Painnamou also makes the best shaved ice in Montreal and is a wonderful date location! Enjoy 10% off with HKSN today!
Incredibly authentic and tasty Korean cuisine located near Concordia! Delicious pork-bone soup amongst other classic Korean dishes!
Healthy beverages for somewhat fair prices! Take care of your body next time you\'re at SSMU with a drink from Liquid Nutrition!
Delicious Pho right underneath McGill\'s very own New Residence Hall! Convenient and tasty for those cold Montreal winters!
Wonderful Taiwanese food joint in downtown Montreal! They sell delicious pork rice along with classic Taiwanese bubble tea, served with tiny bubbles on select days!

Watch as your noodles are kneaded, pulled, and then boiled right in front of your eyes! Nudo serves some of the most bomb noodles in all of Montreal and HKSN has secured our members a free drink for every meal they devour at Nudo!

Concept of O\’burger – combines delicious gourmet burgers with quick service in a comfortable atmosphere. You get to have a great Angus Beef patty with all fresh ingredients like fresh mushrooms a variety of real cheeses. Get 10% off with HKSN today!

Putting edge takes the traditional game of mini golf, brought it indoors, turned down the lights and turned up the music to create a 18 hole fantasy land of vibrant color and surreal themes. Putting Edge is perfect for that night out with the friends, with that special someone, or a fun-filled family outing. Take a break from reality, and visit Putting Edge today!
Go to place for that quick bite in between study sessions. Yummy Vietnamese food ranging from pho to pepper chicken, take 10% with HKSN!

Located right underneath New Rez, Spicy Noodle is that perfect go to bite when you want some fast and authentic Chinese food. From general tao chicken to pad thai, Spicy Noodle is perfect for that study break meal!

When Korean dramas talk about beer and chicken, they’re referencing Basak. Their chicken is the most flavourful, tender, and crispy fried chicken in Montreal. Coupled with some beer, it’s the perfect place to relive your Korean drama dreams!
Yogurty\’s is the ultimate self-serve frozen yogurt experience that lets you create your own froyo masterpiece with a choice of over 155 flavours. Try it today on Parc!
